flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=35>>35 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-35 = <<59-35=21>>21 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 21 seashells which is 21*(1/4) = <<21*(1/4)=21/4>>21/4 seashells
They are now left with 59-21/4 = <<59-21/4=215/4>>215/4 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
